description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains DAI, and sUSD that are lent out to Aave, a decentralized money market on Ethereum.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains DAI, and sUSD that are lent out to Aave, a decentralized money market on Ethereum.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo contiene DAI y sUSD que se prestan a Aave, un mercado monetario descentralizado en Ethereum.

zh.description: Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者赚取交易费，将代币存入 Curve gauge 还能获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含存入 Aave 的 DAI 和 sUSD，Aave 是以太坊上的去中心化货币市场。
